name: Colors of the Universe (Axiom GameLabs)
description:
A 3D Platformy-Type game, with a procedurally generated cube-grid map and color palette in an open space setting, where you have to jump on cubes of the same colors of the player and use your shield to survive meteorite-showers.

The current goal is to reach the golden sphere at the opposite corner of the map, where the big flag is.

Use your resources (fuel and energy) carefully and find out the right strategies to make them recover the best way possible.

CONTROLS

space = jump

space + space = double jump

c = jetpack

rx mouse = shield

CREDITS

MUSIC

Odyssey by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4995-odyssey
